arts.ttl: Liverpool Predicted Lineup vs. Newcastle: Szoboszlai Starts in Defence as Gravenberch Returns
arts.sum: Liverpool have a tough test at St. James’ Park in the Premier League on Monday night.

arts.ttl: Journalist serves up new Alexander Isak reality check that Liverpool fans don’t want to hear
arts.sum: A very excellent summing up of where we are at now, with the saga of Newcastle United, Alexander Isak and Liverpool. The summer 2025 transfer window opened 84 days ago.... You can click here to read the full article. Source

arts.ttl: Darwin Nunez sends another message to Liverpool as Alexander Isak transfer stalls
arts.sum: Liverpool sold Darwin Nunez to Al-Hilal earlier this summer and the Reds are hoping to bring in Newcastle striker Alexander Isak as his replacement, but the deal has stalled

arts.ttl: Isak to Liverpool ‘sooner rather than later’ as manager confirms long-awaited move next week
arts.sum: Liverpool have received an exciting update on the future of Newcastle United striker Alexander Isak as the Anfield club enters into a pivotal final week of the transfer window, in which at least two blockbuster deals are on the table. He writes: “Isak looks like he will come to Anfield sooner rather than later, and there have certainly been signs of Newcastle's resolve weakening in recent days.

arts.ttl: ‘We Can’t’—Eddie Howe Sets Firm Conditions for Alexander Isak Transfer to Liverpool
arts.sum: Newcastle’s manager outlined the steps that have to be taken before Alexander Isak can join Liverpool.

arts.ttl: Jacob Ramsey set to make Newcastle debut in much-anticipated Liverpool clash
arts.sum: The 24-year-old midfielder joined the Magpies from Aston Villa last week in a deal which could eventually amount to £43million.

arts.ttl: Transfer Rumors: Liverpool Offer Isak Swap; Rodrygo Agrees Premier League Switch
arts.sum: AC Milan, Atalanta, Inter, Napoli, Roma and Fulham are all interested in Liverpool winger Federico Chiesa, while talks have also been held over offering the Italy international to Newcastle United as part of a deal for Alexander Isak . Tottenham Hotspur are close to agreeing a deal to sign Real Madrid forward Rodrygo on loan after voicing a willingness to cover his entire salary.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot handed brutal warning over £300m Liverpool spree as Alexander Isak issue emerges
arts.sum: Arne Slot’s Dutch compatriot Wim Kieft reckons the expectancy at Anfield will rise another few notches if the Reds can do a deal to snatch £150million-rated Alexander Isak away from Newcastle
